newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tonen Corp 1997 refinery shutdown schedule.
newsitem.headline: Tonen Corp 1997 refinery shutdown schedule.

text.p: Oil refiner Tonen Corp said on Thursday it plans to shut its 175,000 barrel-per-day (bpd) crude distillation unit (CDU) at its Kawasaki plant near Tokyo from mid-May to early July next year for routine maintenance.
The other CDU at the plant, with a capacity of 65,000 bpd, will be closed for about a month from early September, a Tonen spokeswoman said.

At Tonen's Wakayama plant in western Japan, a 36,000 bpd topper is scheduled to be shut from early July to early August, while the other CDU with a processing capacity of 130,000 bpd will be up and running throughout the year, she said.
